import{DELETE_COMPANY_ID,DELETE_COMPANY_ID_SUCCESS,EDIT_COMPANY_ID,EDIT_COMPANY_ID_SUCCESS,FETCH_COMPANY_LIST,FETCH_COMPANY_LIST_ERROR,FETCH_COMPANY_LIST_SUCCESS,GET_COMPANYGROUP,GET_COMPANYGROUP_SUCCESS,POST_COMPANY_SUBMIT,POST_COMPANY_SUBMIT_SUCCESS,UPDATE_COMPANY_ID,UPDATE_COMPANY_ID_SUCCESS}from"./actionType";export var PostCompanySubmit=function PostCompanySubmit(data){return{type:POST_COMPANY_SUBMIT,data:data};};export var PostCompanySubmitSuccess=function PostCompanySubmitSuccess(companySubmitSuccesss){return{type:POST_COMPANY_SUBMIT_SUCCESS,payload:companySubmitSuccesss};};// Fetch Modules get Data Actions 
export var fetchCompanyList=function fetchCompanyList(data){return{type:FETCH_COMPANY_LIST,data:data};};export var fetchCompanyListSuccess=function fetchCompanyListSuccess(companyList){return{type:FETCH_COMPANY_LIST_SUCCESS,payload:companyList};};export var fetchCompanyListError=function fetchCompanyListError(modulesListError){return{type:FETCH_COMPANY_LIST_ERROR,payload:modulesListError};};//Edit COMPANY Using Id
export var editCompanyID=function editCompanyID(id,pageMode){return{type:EDIT_COMPANY_ID,id:id,pageMode:pageMode};};export var editCompanyIDSuccess=function editCompanyIDSuccess(editData){return{type:EDIT_COMPANY_ID_SUCCESS,payload:editData};};// Delete Company ID Actions
export var deleteCompany_ID=function deleteCompany_ID(id){return{type:DELETE_COMPANY_ID,id:id};};export var deleteCompanyIDSuccess=function deleteCompanyIDSuccess(deleteCompanyID){return{type:DELETE_COMPANY_ID_SUCCESS,payload:deleteCompanyID};};export var updateCompanyID=function updateCompanyID(data,ID){return{type:UPDATE_COMPANY_ID,data:data,ID:ID};};export var updateCompanyIDSuccess=function updateCompanyIDSuccess(updateMessage){return{type:UPDATE_COMPANY_ID_SUCCESS,payload:updateMessage};};/// CompanyGroup dropdown
export var getCompanyGroup=function getCompanyGroup(){return{type:GET_COMPANYGROUP};};export var getCompanyGroupSuccess=function getCompanyGroupSuccess(CompanyGroup){return{type:GET_COMPANYGROUP_SUCCESS,payload:CompanyGroup};};
